name: User1st Ltd
description: Provider of a website-access software designed to provide access to proprietary automated accessibility tools. The company's software offers a cloud-based application that meets the needs of a wide range of customers to ensure their digital content is accessible, enabling professionals, webmasters, content managers, user experience managers and developers to make any website accessible without changing the existing codebase.
one_liner: Provider of a website-access software designed to provide access to proprietary automated accessibility tools. The company's software offers a cloud-based application that meets the needs of a wide range of customers to ensure their digital content is accessible, enabling professionals, webmasters, content managers, user experience managers and developers to make any website accessible without changing the existing codebase.
